name: HH_OASIS_ENC
description: Contains Home Health Outcome and Assessment Information Set (OASIS) and Hospice Item Set (HIS) overtime single items.

columns.name: OASIS_SET_ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the OASIS data set.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: Unique identifier for this contact for this patient.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: INSTANT_OF_ENTRY
columns.description: Instant of OASIS data set data entry.

columns.name: DATA_ENTRY_PERSON
columns.description: Name of user who entered data in OASIS data set.

columns.name: DATASET_CONTACT_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: This item stores the OASIS/HIS dataset type.
